body:
This map is good.
but the lag back just ruins it.
If it can't be sorted it out just remove it please.

title: Axis Problems :/

replies.body: We appreciate you telling us this but if you believe the map has bugs, post this to GitHub. In response to the OP, we will try alert the map developers and map owners and see if they can fix this.
